IndexPage.title: Factorio Calculator
IndexPage.description: Factorio Calculator is a tool that helps players calculate resource production and consumption in the game Factorio.
IndexPage.pDescription: Factorio Calculator is a tool that helps players calculate resource production and consumption in the game Factorio.

indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: The Factorio Calculator is a utility designed to help players of the game Factorio to plan and optimize their in-game factories. It allows users to calculate the production and consumption rates of various resources, taking into account game mechanics and module effects.
indexQuestion.h2_2: How can I use the Factorio Calculator?
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: To use the Factorio Calculator, you input the details of your desired production line, such as the type of resource, production rate, and any modules or beacons you plan to use. The calculator then provides you with the number of machines needed and the overall efficiency of your setup.
indexQuestion.h2_3: Does the Factorio Calculator support mods?
indexQuestion.h2_3_p1: Yes, many versions of the Factorio Calculator are compatible with mods. You can input the specific settings or recipes from mods to calculate production rates for modded content, helping you to integrate mods into your factory planning.
indexQuestion.h2_4: Can I calculate the cost of my production line with the Factorio Calculator?
indexQuestion.h2_4_p1: While the Factorio Calculator primarily focuses on production and consumption rates, some versions can also estimate the cost of your production line in terms of resources and time required to gather those resources.
indexQuestion.h2_5: How accurate are the calculations provided by the Factorio Calculator?
indexQuestion.h2_5_p1: The accuracy of the Factorio Calculator depends on the input data and the game's mechanics. As long as you input accurate information and the calculator is up-to-date with the game version, the calculations should be reliable for planning purposes.
indexQuestion.h2_6: Can I share my factory setup with others using the Factorio Calculator?
indexQuestion.h2_6_p1: Yes, many Factorio Calculators allow you to export your factory setup, which can be shared with others for review or collaboration. This feature is useful for getting feedback from the community or for educational purposes.
indexQuestion.h2_7: How often should I update the Factorio Calculator to ensure it's compatible with the latest game version?
indexQuestion.h2_7_p1: It's recommended to check for updates to the Factorio Calculator whenever there's a significant game update. Game updates can change mechanics and introduce new elements that may affect the accuracy of the calculator's output.

featureInfos.h2_1_p1: The Factorio Calculator offers a detailed overview of resource production and consumption, allowing players to manage their factory's resources effectively.
featureInfos.h2_2_p1: With the ability to incorporate mods, the Factorio Calculator extends its functionality to accommodate a wide range of custom content, ensuring that calculations remain accurate regardless of the game's modifications.
featureInfos.h2_3_p1: The calculator provides insights into the most efficient use of machines and resources, helping players to minimize waste and maximize output in their Factorio factories.
featureInfos.h2_4_p1: Users can input various recipes and the Factorio Calculator will dynamically calculate the required inputs and outputs, offering a flexible planning tool for different factory setups.
featureInfos.h2_5_p1: As players adjust their factory designs, the Factorio Calculator offers real-time updates and feedback on the impact of these changes, enabling quick decision-making and adjustments.
featureInfos.h2_6_p1: The Factorio Calculator allows users to export their factory layouts and share them with others, facilitating collaboration and knowledge exchange within the Factorio community.

playInfos.h2_1_p1: Since Factorio Calculator is designed to be a calming and relaxing game, there's no need to rush. Take your time to enjoy the process of tidying up and organizing. The slower pace can help reduce stress and promote a sense of tranquility.
playInfos.h2_2_p1: Pay attention to the ASMR sounds that accompany your actions in the game. These sounds are meant to enhance your relaxation and provide a more immersive experience. Use headphones for the best audio experience.
playInfos.h2_3_p1: Factorio Calculator is not just about completing tasks quickly; it's also about the satisfaction of creating order and beauty. Take the time to arrange items in a way that pleases you visually, as this can add to the overall sense of accomplishment.
playInfos.h2_4: Use It as a Digital Escape
playInfos.h2_4_p1: Treat Factorio Calculator as a form of digital meditation. Use the game as a way to disconnect from the outside world and focus on the simple, satisfying tasks at hand. This can help clear your mind and provide a moment of peace in your day.

testimonialInfos.h2_1_p1: As a seasoned Factorio player, I've tried various tools to optimize my factory designs, but the Factorio Calculator has been a game-changer. It's incredibly intuitive and has saved me countless hours by accurately calculating my production needs. It's now an indispensable part of my planning process.
testimonialInfos.h2_2_p1: The Factorio Calculator has been a lifesaver for my large-scale factory projects. It's amazing how it can handle complex modded scenarios and provide precise calculations. The ability to share my setups with the community for feedback has also been invaluable. It's truly a testament to how powerful a well-designed tool can be in the right hands.
testimonialInfos.h2_3_p1: I've always struggled with the logistics of building efficient factories in Factorio, but the Factorio Calculator has made all the difference. It's user-friendly, and the mod support is outstanding. I can now visualize my production lines and make adjustments on the fly. It's a must-have for any serious Factorio player looking to take their game to the next level.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ｜ Factorio Calculator
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing Factorio Calculator! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: When you use Factorio Calculator, we may collect your name, email address, and payment information for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may also collect non-personal data through web cookies to enhance your browsing experience.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: We collect your personal data solely for order processing purposes.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share your personal data with any third parties.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: Factorio Calculator does not knowingly collect any personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy via email.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service ｜ Factorio Calculator
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of Factorio Calculator (the "Service"), provided by Factorio Calculator ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: Factorio Calculator allowing users to generate text-to-video easily.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at
